POO.content: “anyone can specialize in the analysis of rituals; it is not therefore a specialty”
POO.linkedContent: “anyone can specialize in the analysis of rituals; it is not therefore a specialty”

POO.content: the uncertain boundary btwn actor & analyst
POO.linkedContent: the uncertain boundary btwn actor & analyst

POO.content: Edgar Allen Poe’s def. of analysis: imaginative
POO.linkedContent: Edgar Allen Poe’s def. of analysis: imaginative

PP.content: analyst tries to distinguish btwn two repetitions, which is good which is bad
PP.linkedContent: analyst tries to distinguish btwn two repetitions, which is good which is bad

F.content: analyst can only decrypt secret seal of [other, patient’s] name w/ his own name > works on his own name
F.linkedContent: analyst can only decrypt secret seal of [other, patient’s] name w/ his own name > works on his own name

ROP.content: the poleros (politics, polemos, eros, seduction) of analysis, ends in an abyss, where resistance to psychoanalytic Lösung, in the name of truth, can only be a disavowal > to analyze, to say to other: prefer, take, love my solution, you will be in truth if you do not resist my solution
ROP.linkedContent: the poleros (politics, polemos, eros, seduction) of analysis, ends in an abyss, where resistance to psychoanalytic Lösung, in the name of truth, can only be a disavowal > to analyze, to say to other: prefer, take, love my solution, you will be in truth if you do not resist my solution

ROP.content: Derrida proposes an other resistance, that of the remainder, thus a restanalysis
ROP.linkedContent: Derrida proposes an other resistance, that of the remainder, thus a restanalysis

ROP.content: what forever exceeds the analysis of the dream: a knot that can’t be untied, un fil, qui, pour être coupé, comme un cordon ombilical, n’en reste pas moins à jamais noué [knotted even when cut], à même le corps, a la place du nombril [name?] > la cicatrice est un noeud contre lequel l’analyse ne peut rien
ROP.linkedContent: what forever exceeds the analysis of the dream: a knot that can’t be untied, un fil, qui, pour être coupé, comme un cordon ombilical, n’en reste pas moins à jamais noué [knotted even when cut], à même le corps, a la place du nombril [name?] > la cicatrice est un noeud contre lequel l’analyse ne peut rien

ROP.content: history of analysis, from Plato to Freud, has Freud invented a new solution to analytical resistance or has he inherited by way of paleonym?; no choice but to keep 2 motifs analysis, doubling of analuein: 1) archeological/anagogical movement toward originary birth 2) eschatological movement toward last word, toward untying, breaking down (lytic, lytological, philolytic) [analysis in teaching (philosophy), in confession]
ROP.linkedContent: history of analysis, from Plato to Freud, has Freud invented a new solution to analytical resistance or has he inherited by way of paleonym?; no choice but to keep 2 motifs analysis, doubling of analuein: 1) archeological/anagogical movement toward originary birth 2) eschatological movement toward last word, toward untying, breaking down (lytic, lytological, philolytic) [analysis in teaching (philosophy), in confession]

ROP.content: as such, Freud’s discourse answerable to logico-epistemological tribunal of analytic tradition
ROP.linkedContent: as such, Freud’s discourse answerable to logico-epistemological tribunal of analytic tradition

ROP.content: paralysis gives movement w/ regard to its other [this is in reference to impossibility of psychoanalysis’ auto-interpretation] (in PAS, paralysis distinguished from logic of analysis)
ROP.linkedContent: paralysis gives movement w/ regard to its other [this is in reference to impossibility of psychoanalysis’ auto-interpretation] (in PAS, paralysis distinguished from logic of analysis)

ROP.content: double bind drives deconstruction in rhythmic compulsion to track desire for origin, and to raise its stakes, la pousse à une surenchère > interminable drama of analysis, il fallait faire droit to the law deconstructed, w/ une affirmation donatrice unknown to yet driving analysis
ROP.linkedContent: double bind drives deconstruction in rhythmic compulsion to track desire for origin, and to raise its stakes, la pousse à une surenchère > interminable drama of analysis, il fallait faire droit to the law deconstructed, w/ une affirmation donatrice unknown to yet driving analysis

ROP.content: iterability as condition/constitution of identity, ideality, of all concepts, but also (double bind) that which resists hierarchical and binary oppositions, a quasi-concept, inconceivable concept > not confusion, approximation, but “reaffirmed exigency of analysis”
ROP.linkedContent: iterability as condition/constitution of identity, ideality, of all concepts, but also (double bind) that which resists hierarchical and binary oppositions, a quasi-concept, inconceivable concept > not confusion, approximation, but “reaffirmed exigency of analysis”

ROP.content: what always rejects analysis: nonsimple, origin under erasure, trace, or affirmation of gift as trace [differance as divisibility]
ROP.linkedContent: what always rejects analysis: nonsimple, origin under erasure, trace, or affirmation of gift as trace [differance as divisibility]

ROP.content: analysis is interminable because there is no indivisible/simple element
ROP.linkedContent: analysis is interminable because there is no indivisible/simple element

ROP.content: double bind (preferable to double contrainte), is the call to analysis: one can never fully analyze it, one can only unbind one of its knots by making the other tighter: movement I call stricture
ROP.linkedContent: double bind (preferable to double contrainte), is the call to analysis: one can never fully analyze it, one can only unbind one of its knots by making the other tighter: movement I call stricture

DPi.content: analysis as internal dissociation, element by element
DPi.linkedContent: analysis as internal dissociation, element by element

CHM.content: the hermeneut, the analyst, must first know language of patient, the immediate materiality of sign (move from sign to signified, obvious meaning to latent)
CHM.linkedContent: the hermeneut, the analyst, must first know language of patient, the immediate materiality of sign (move from sign to signified, obvious meaning to latent)

AFR.content: how can Locke carve out a trail while repeating an earlier rupture? he applied a general law to particular domain
AFR.linkedContent: how can Locke carve out a trail while repeating an earlier rupture? he applied a general law to particular domain

AFR.content: by preceding analogically, he discovered an unknown > invention by analogy (or analysis): new “objects” created by transposing, proportioning, analyzing
AFR.linkedContent: by preceding analogically, he discovered an unknown > invention by analogy (or analysis): new “objects” created by transposing, proportioning, analyzing

NOY.content: quasi-analytic: yes never lets itself return to ultimate simplicity, it is the fatality of repetition, repetition as incisive opening (ouverture coupante)
NOY.linkedContent: quasi-analytic: yes never lets itself return to ultimate simplicity, it is the fatality of repetition, repetition as incisive opening (ouverture coupante)

NOY.content: an analytic must return to structures, whereas yes can only be fictive, fabulous—given over to adverbial dimension of a “quasi”
NOY.linkedContent: an analytic must return to structures, whereas yes can only be fictive, fabulous—given over to adverbial dimension of a “quasi”

CIR.content: pronounce an atrociously tragic sentence, make its quotation marks appear, abandoning it to anonymity, putting forward an analysis > for more drama, who more than the other is vulnerable to analysis?
CIR.linkedContent: pronounce an atrociously tragic sentence, make its quotation marks appear, abandoning it to anonymity, putting forward an analysis > for more drama, who more than the other is vulnerable to analysis?

SPEC.content: analysand-locomotive (speculator/analyst the 1st analysand): for whom law of listening substituted for law of looking
SPEC.linkedContent: analysand-locomotive (speculator/analyst the 1st analysand): for whom law of listening substituted for law of looking

FV.content: Poe: it is in matters beyond limits of rule that skill of analyst is evinced
FV.linkedContent: Poe: it is in matters beyond limits of rule that skill of analyst is evinced
